name: PeerMe MultiSig: Propose Async Call
title: Propose async smart contract call
description: Use when a user wants to make an asynchronous smart contract call from the multi-sig. Creates a proposal for calling another contract's endpoint with optional EGLD.

inputs.name: Contract Address
inputs.description: The smart contract address to call.

inputs.name: EGLD Amount
inputs.description: The amount of EGLD to send with the call (in wei, will be scaled by 18 decimals).

inputs.name: Gas Limit
inputs.description: Optional gas limit for the execution (leave empty for default).

messages.success: Proposal created successfully. Action ID: {{ACTION_ID_NUMBER}}. The async call proposal is now awaiting signatures.

label.de: Benachrichtigung erhalten, wenn dieser Vorschlag unterzeichnet wird
